channel.title: Orange Starter Kit - MangOH - GPios fail
channel.description:
hello, I got some problems with my gpios
this is the messages I get after a logread -f:
Nov 12 16:00:38 swi-mdm9x28-wp user.err kernel: [16482.844335] usb 1-1.1: failed to read gpios
apps are running well

item.title: Orange Starter Kit - MangOH - GPios fail
item.dc:creator: SRNV
item.description:
yes …
this is what I did.
to day it ain’t appeared

Read full topic
item.source: Orange Starter Kit - MangOH - GPios fail

item.title: Orange Starter Kit - MangOH - GPios fail
item.dc:creator: asyal
item.description:
dfrey:

ssage originates in the CP2130 USB-to-SPI adapter driver code which is found at linux_kernel_modules/cp2130/spi-cp2130.c on line 1308. I’m not sure why this message is appearing. Do you have any ideas?

Are you plugging the GPS antenna while the mangoh is running?

Read full topic
item.source: Orange Starter Kit - MangOH - GPios fail

item.title: Orange Starter Kit - MangOH - GPios fail

item.description:
this message appeared after I tried to plug my antenna on GNSS port
